name: Brain Link (prunuspadis)
description:
My submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021

Brain link is top down 2d space shooter where you have to work with partner AI while some of your controls are joined.  Linked controls keep changing.  

Controls:

  •  wasd/arrows to move 
  • Left mouse to shoot, cursor for aim

Tips:

Friendly fire is ON,  yellow triangles are Health pickups

Assets:

All visual and audio assets are download for free from itch.io, all code used was written by me during jam.  Asset credits:

  • https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names
  • https://gamesupply.itch.io/ultimate-space-game-mega-asset-package
  • https://dinvstudio.itch.io/dynamic-space-background-lite-free
